description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 9th March 2020 (RN: 19/04899/FULL) for, 'Excavation of extension to provide a second basement level, demolition and re-build of the 6th and 7th floors and extension to form new 8th floor, erection of rear extension from ground to new 8th floor level, all to enlarge existing hotel (Class C1).  External alterations including alterations to the appearance of the existing facades'; Namely, to make changes to the approved drawings to allow; alteration to the fenestration and detailed design at ground, first and eight floor level, alteration to the fenestration to one of the elevations to the courtyard; removal of a balcony to guest rooms facing the existing lightwell to the east of the building from first to eight floor level; alterations to the form of the seventh floor and eight floor level thereby creating a set back at eight floor level adjoining 17-20 New Bond Street and creating a lightwell at seventh floor level adjoining 17-20 New Bond Street set behind  the permitted facade along the New Bond Street frontage, internal alterations and reconfigurations resulting in the reduction of a 1 guest room at seventh floor level and an increase of 3 guest rooms at eight floor level and reconfigurations of lift and stair cores. (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
